00065 void
00066 MSFrame::fillOptions() {
00067     OptionsCont& oc = OptionsCont::getOptions();
00068     oc.addCallExample("-b 0 -e 1000 -n net.xml -r routes.xml");
00069     oc.addCallExample("-c munich_config.cfg");
00070     oc.addCallExample("--help");
00071 
00072     // insert options sub-topics
00073     SystemFrame::addConfigurationOptions(oc); // fill this subtopic, too
00074     oc.addOptionSubTopic("Input");
00075     oc.addOptionSubTopic("Output");
00076     oc.addOptionSubTopic("Time");
00077     oc.addOptionSubTopic("Processing");
00078     SystemFrame::addReportOptions(oc); // fill this subtopic, too
00079 
00080 
00081     // register configuration options
00082     //  register input options
00083     oc.doRegister("net-file", 'n', new Option_FileName());
00084     oc.addSynonyme("net-file", "net");
00085     oc.addDescription("net-file", "Input", "Load road network description from FILE");
00086 
00087     oc.doRegister("route-files", 'r', new Option_FileName());
00088     oc.addSynonyme("route-files", "routes");
00089     oc.addDescription("route-files", "Input", "Load routes descriptions from FILE(s)");
00090 
00091     oc.doRegister("additional-files", 'a', new Option_FileName());
00092     oc.addSynonyme("additional-files", "additional");
00093     oc.addDescription("additional-files", "Input", "Load additional descriptions from FILE(s)");
00094 
00095    /* *
00096      * The 'extraInf' option is being added by the HI-Iberia (doancea).
00097      * This option shall be registered in order to be able to load additional configuration files.*/
00098 
00099     oc.doRegister("extra-file", 'E', new Option_FileName());
00100     oc.addSynonyme("extra-file", "external description file");
00101     oc.addDescription("extra-file", "Input", "Load scenario simulation description from FILE(s)");
00102     // Here ends HI-Iberia contribution.
00103 
00104     oc.doRegister("weight-files", 'w', new Option_FileName());
00105     oc.addSynonyme("weight-files", "weights");
00106     oc.addDescription("weight-files", "Input", "Load edge/lane weights for online rerouting from FILE");
00107     oc.doRegister("weight-attribute", 'x', new Option_String("traveltime"));
00108     oc.addSynonyme("weight-attribute", "measure", true);
00109     oc.addDescription("weight-attribute", "Input", "Name of the xml attribute which gives the edge weight");
00110 
00111 #ifdef HAVE_MESOSIM
00112     oc.doRegister("load-state", new Option_FileName());
00113     oc.addDescription("load-state", "Input", "Loads a network state from FILE");
00114     oc.doRegister("load-state.offset", new Option_String("0", "TIME"));
00115     oc.addDescription("load-state.offset", "Input", "Sets the time offset for vehicle segment exit times.");
00116 #endif
00117 
00118     //  register output options
00119     oc.doRegister("netstate-dump-fev", new Option_FileName());
00120     oc.doRegister("netstate-dump", new Option_FileName());
00121     oc.addSynonyme("netstate-dump", "ndump");
00122     oc.addSynonyme("netstate-dump", "netstate");
00123     oc.addSynonyme("netstate-dump-fev", "the simulation result file"); // Added by HI-Iberia (doancea)
00124     oc.addDescription("netstate-dump", "Output", "Save complete network states into FILE");
00125     oc.addDescription("netstate-dump-fev","Output","Save electric vehicle simulation states into a FILE"); //Added by HI-Iberia (doancea)
00126     oc.doRegister("netstate-dump.empty-edges", new Option_Bool(false));
00127     oc.addSynonyme("netstate-dump.empty-edges", "netstate.empty-edges");
00128     oc.addSynonyme("netstate-dump.empty-edges", "dump-empty-edges", true);
00129     oc.addDescription("netstate-dump.empty-edges", "Output", "Write also empty edges completely when dumping");
00130 
00131     oc.doRegister("summary-output", new Option_FileName());
00132     oc.addSynonyme("summary-output", "summary");
00133     oc.addSynonyme("summary-output", "emissions-output", true);
00134     oc.addSynonyme("summary-output", "emissions", true);
00135     oc.addDescription("summary-output", "Output", "Save aggregated vehicle departure info into FILE");
00136 
00137     oc.doRegister("tripinfo-output", new Option_FileName());
00138     oc.addSynonyme("tripinfo-output", "tripinfo");
00139     oc.addDescription("tripinfo-output", "Output", "Save single vehicle trip info into FILE");
00140 
00141     oc.doRegister("tripinfo-fev", new Option_FileName());
00142         oc.addSynonyme("tripinfo-fev", "tripinfofev");
00143         oc.addDescription("tripinfo-fev", "Output", "Save single vehicle trip info into FILE");
00144 
00145     oc.doRegister("vehroute-output", new Option_FileName());
00146     oc.addSynonyme("vehroute-output", "vehroutes");
00147     oc.addDescription("vehroute-output", "Output", "Save single vehicle route info into FILE");
00148 
00149     oc.doRegister("vehroute-output.exit-times", new Option_Bool(false));
00150     oc.addSynonyme("vehroute-output.exit-times", "vehroutes.exit-times");
00151     oc.addDescription("vehroute-output.exit-times", "Output", "Write the exit times for all edges");
00152 
00153     oc.doRegister("vehroute-output.last-route", new Option_Bool(false));
00154     oc.addSynonyme("vehroute-output.last-route", "vehroutes.last-route");
00155     oc.addDescription("vehroute-output.last-route", "Output", "Write the last route only");
00156 
00157     oc.doRegister("vehroute-output.sorted", new Option_Bool(false));
00158     oc.addSynonyme("vehroute-output.sorted", "vehroutes.sorted");
00159     oc.addDescription("vehroute-output.sorted", "Output", "Sorts the output by departure time");
00160 
00161 #ifdef HAVE_MESOSIM
00162     oc.doRegister("save-state.times", new Option_IntVector(IntVector()));
00163     oc.addDescription("save-state.times", "Output", "Use INT[] as times at which a network state written");
00164     oc.doRegister("save-state.prefix", new Option_FileName());
00165     oc.addDescription("save-state.prefix", "Output", "Prefix for network states");
00166     oc.doRegister("save-state.files", new Option_FileName());
00167     oc.addDescription("save-state.files", "Output", "Files for network states");
00168 #endif
00169 
00170     // register the simulation settings
00171     oc.doRegister("begin", 'b', new Option_String("0", "TIME"));
00172     oc.addDescription("begin", "Time", "Defines the begin time; The simulation starts at this time");
00173 
00174     oc.doRegister("end", 'e', new Option_String("-1", "TIME"));
00175     oc.addDescription("end", "Time", "Defines the end time; The simulation ends at this time");
00176 
00177 #ifdef HAVE_SUBSECOND_TIMESTEPS
00178     oc.doRegister("step-length", new Option_String("1", "TIME"));
00179     oc.addDescription("step-length", "Time", "Defines the step duration");
00180 #endif
00181 
00182 
00183     // register the processing options
00184     oc.doRegister("route-steps", 's', new Option_Integer(200));
00185     oc.addDescription("route-steps", "Processing", "Load routes for the next INT seconds ahead");
00186 
00187 #ifdef HAVE_INTERNAL_LANES
00188     oc.doRegister("no-internal-links", new Option_Bool(false));
00189     oc.addDescription("no-internal-links", "Processing", "Disable (junction) internal links");
00190 #endif
00191 
00192     oc.doRegister("ignore-accidents", new Option_Bool(false));
00193     oc.addDescription("ignore-accidents", "Processing", "Do not check whether accidents occure more deeply");
00194 
00195     oc.doRegister("ignore-route-errors", new Option_Bool(false));
00196     oc.addDescription("ignore-route-errors", "Processing", "Do not check whether routes are connected");
00197 
00198     oc.doRegister("max-num-vehicles", new Option_Integer(-1));
00199     oc.addSynonyme("max-num-vehicles", "too-many-vehicles", true);
00200     oc.addDescription("max-num-vehicles", "Processing", "Quit simulation if this number of vehicles is exceeded");
00201 
00202     oc.doRegister("incremental-dua-step", new Option_Integer());
00203     oc.addDescription("incremental-dua-step", "Processing", "Perform the simulation as a step in incremental DUA");
00204     oc.doRegister("incremental-dua-base", new Option_Integer(10));
00205     oc.addDescription("incremental-dua-base", "Processing", "Base value for incremental DUA");
00206     oc.doRegister("scale", new Option_Float());
00207     oc.addDescription("scale", "Processing", "Scale demand by the given factor (0..1)");
00208 
00209     oc.doRegister("time-to-teleport", new Option_String("300", "TIME"));
00210     oc.addDescription("time-to-teleport", "Processing", "Specify how long a vehicle may wait until being teleported, defaults to 300, non-positive values disable teleporting");
00211 
00212     oc.doRegister("max-depart-delay", new Option_String("-1", "TIME"));
00213     oc.addDescription("max-depart-delay", "Processing", "How long vehicles wait for departure before being skipped, defaults to -1 which means vehicles are never skipped");
00214 
00215     oc.doRegister("sloppy-insert", new Option_Bool(false));
00216     oc.addDescription("sloppy-insert", "Processing", "Whether insertion on an edge shall not be repeated in same step once failed.");
00217 
00218     oc.doRegister("lanechange.allow-swap", new Option_Bool(false));
00219     oc.addDescription("lanechange.allow-swap", "Processing", "Whether blocking vehicles trying to change lanes may be swapped.");
00220 
00221 
00222     // devices
00223     MSDevice_Routing::insertOptions();
00224     MSDevice_HBEFA::insertOptions();
00225     //MSDevice_FEV::insertOptions();
00226 
00227 
00228 
00229     // register report options
00230     oc.doRegister("no-duration-log", new Option_Bool(false));
00231     oc.addDescription("no-duration-log", "Report", "Disable performance reports for individual simulation steps");
00232 
00233     oc.doRegister("no-step-log", new Option_Bool(false));
00234     oc.addDescription("no-step-log", "Report", "Disable console output of current simulation step");
00235 
00236 
00237 #ifndef NO_TRACI
00238     //remote port 0 if not used
00239     oc.addOptionSubTopic("TraCI Server");
00240     oc.doRegister("remote-port", new Option_Integer(0));
00241     oc.addDescription("remote-port", "TraCI Server", "Enables TraCI Server if set");
00242 #ifdef HAVE_PYTHON
00243     oc.doRegister("python-script", new Option_String());
00244     oc.addDescription("python-script", "TraCI Server", "Runs TraCI script with embedded python");
00245 #endif
00246 #endif
00247     //
00248 #ifdef HAVE_MESOSIM
00249     oc.addOptionSubTopic("Mesoscopic");
00250     oc.doRegister("mesosim", new Option_Bool(false));
00251     oc.addDescription("mesosim", "Mesoscopic", "Enables mesoscopic simulation");
00252     oc.doRegister("meso-edgelength", new Option_Float(98.0f));
00253     oc.addDescription("meso-edgelength", "Mesoscopic", "Length of an edge segment in mesoscopic simulation");
00254     oc.doRegister("meso-tauff", new Option_String("1.4", "TIME"));
00255     oc.addDescription("meso-tauff", "Mesoscopic", "Factor for calculating the free-free headway time");
00256     oc.doRegister("meso-taufj", new Option_String("1.4", "TIME"));
00257     oc.addDescription("meso-taufj", "Mesoscopic", "Factor for calculating the free-jam headway time");
00258     oc.doRegister("meso-taujf", new Option_String("2", "TIME"));
00259     oc.addDescription("meso-taujf", "Mesoscopic", "Factor for calculating the jam-free headway time");
00260     oc.doRegister("meso-taujj", new Option_String("2", "TIME"));
00261     oc.addDescription("meso-taujj", "Mesoscopic", "Factor for calculating the jam-jam headway time");
00262     oc.doRegister("meso-jam-threshold", new Option_Float(0.29f));
00263     oc.addDescription("meso-jam-threshold", "Mesoscopic", "Minimum percentage of occupied space to consider a segment jammed");
00264     oc.doRegister("meso-multi-queue", new Option_Bool(false));
00265     oc.addDescription("meso-multi-queue", "Mesoscopic", "Enable multiple queues at edge ends");
00266     oc.doRegister("meso-junction-control", new Option_Bool(false));
00267     oc.addDescription("meso-junction-control", "Mesoscopic", "Enable mesoscopic traffic light and priority junction handling");
00268     oc.doRegister("meso-recheck", new Option_String("0", "TIME"));
00269     oc.addDescription("meso-recheck", "Mesoscopic", "Time interval for rechecking insertion into the next segment after failure");
00270 #endif
00271 
00272     // add rand options
00273     RandHelper::insertRandOptions();
00274 
00275     // add GUI options
00276     // the reason that we include them in vanilla sumo as well is to make reusing config files easy
00277     oc.addOptionSubTopic("GUI Only");
00278     oc.doRegister("gui-settings-file", new Option_FileName());
00279     oc.addDescription("gui-settings-file", "GUI Only", "Load visualisation settings from FILE");
00280 
00281     oc.doRegister("quit-on-end", 'Q', new Option_Bool(false));
00282     oc.addDescription("quit-on-end", "GUI Only", "Quits the GUI when the simulation stops");
00283 
00284     oc.doRegister("game", 'G', new Option_Bool(false));
00285     oc.addDescription("game", "GUI Only", "Start the GUI in gaming mode");
00286 
00287     oc.doRegister("start", 'S', new Option_Bool(false));
00288     oc.addDescription("start", "GUI Only", "Start the simulation after loading");
00289 
00290     oc.doRegister("disable-textures", 'T', new Option_Bool(false));
00291     oc.addDescription("disable-textures", "GUI Only", "Do not load background pictures");
00292 
00293 }

00296 void
00297 MSFrame::buildStreams() {
00298     // standard outputs
00299     OutputDevice::createDeviceByOption("netstate-dump-fev", "ecogem-syntethic-data");
00300     OutputDevice::createDeviceByOption("netstate-dump", "sumo-netstate");
00301     OutputDevice::createDeviceByOption("summary-output", "summary");
00302     OutputDevice::createDeviceByOption("tripinfo-output", "tripinfos");
00303     OutputDevice::createDeviceByOption("tripinfo-fev", "tripinfofev");
00304     MSDevice_Vehroutes::init();
00305 }
00306 
00307 
00308 bool
00309 MSFrame::checkOptions() {
00310     OptionsCont& oc = OptionsCont::getOptions();
00311     bool ok = true;
00312     if (!oc.isSet("net-file")) {
00313         WRITE_ERROR("No network file (-n) specified.");
00314         ok = false;
00315     }
00316     if (oc.isSet("incremental-dua-step") && oc.isSet("incremental-dua-base")) {
00317         WRITE_WARNING("The options 'incremental-dua-step' and 'incremental-dua-base' are deprecated, use 'scale' instead.");
00318         if (oc.getInt("incremental-dua-step") > oc.getInt("incremental-dua-base")) {
00319             WRITE_ERROR("Invalid dua step.");
00320             ok = false;
00321         }
00322     }
00323     if (!oc.isDefault("scale")) {
00324         if (oc.getFloat("scale") < 0. || oc.getFloat("scale") > 1.) {
00325             WRITE_ERROR("Invalid scaling factor.");
00326             ok = false;
00327         }
00328     }
00329     if (oc.getBool("vehroute-output.exit-times") && !oc.isSet("vehroute-output")) {
00330         WRITE_ERROR("A vehroute-output file is needed for exit times.");
00331         ok = false;
00332     }
00333     return ok;
00334 }
00335 
00336 
00337 void
00338 MSFrame::setMSGlobals(OptionsCont& oc) {
00339     // pre-initialise the network
00340     // set whether empty edges shall be printed on dump
00341     MSGlobals::gOmitEmptyEdgesOnDump = !oc.getBool("netstate-dump.empty-edges");
00342 #ifdef HAVE_INTERNAL_LANES
00343     // set whether internal lanes shall be used
00344     MSGlobals::gUsingInternalLanes = !oc.getBool("no-internal-links");
00345 #else
00346     MSGlobals::gUsingInternalLanes = false;
00347 #endif
00348     // set the grid lock time
00349     MSGlobals::gTimeToGridlock = string2time(oc.getString("time-to-teleport")) < 0 ? 0 : string2time(oc.getString("time-to-teleport"));
00350     MSGlobals::gCheck4Accidents = !oc.getBool("ignore-accidents");
00351     MSGlobals::gCheckRoutes = !oc.getBool("ignore-route-errors");
00352 #ifdef HAVE_MESOSIM
00353     MSGlobals::gStateLoaded = oc.isSet("load-state");
00354     MSGlobals::gUseMesoSim = oc.getBool("mesosim");
00355 #endif
00356 
00357 #ifdef HAVE_SUBSECOND_TIMESTEPS
00358     DELTA_T = string2time(oc.getString("step-length"));
00359 #endif
00360 }
